<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update user view sort"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/views/{viewId}/sort"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the sort configuration for an existing user view. Controls which field is used for ordering results and the sort direction.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/users/views](/docs/api/users/list-user-views) to list views. Extract `Items[].ViewId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List views: [GET /api/v1.0/users/views](/docs/api/users/list-user-views) â†’ find the view to modify
2. Update sort: POST this endpoint with Field, Name, and Direction

**Minimal Required Fields**: Field (field identifier), Name (display name), Direction ('Ascending' or 'Descending')

**Notes**: The Field value must match a valid sortable column for the view type. Common fields include 'LastName', 'Email', 'CreatedDate'. Changes take effect immediately for subsequent queries using this view.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Identifier of the user view to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Sort configuration applied to a saved view.","properties":{"Field":{"type":"string","description":"Internal field name used by the API when ordering results.","example":"TicketClosedDate"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable label shown to users for the sorted column.","example":"Closed Date"},"Direction":{"type":"string","description":"Direction applied to the sort.","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"example":"Ascending"}},"required":["Field","Name","Direction"],"title":"ViewSort"},"example":{"Field":"LastName","Name":"Last Name","Direction":"Ascending"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
